datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to planting in cities, community gardens, and sustainable urban landscapes.

columns.name: number_of_annual_events
columns.description: The number of events held at the garden each year.

columns.name: irrigation_system_quality
columns.description: Quality level of the garden's irrigation system, rated from low to high.

columns.name: funding_from_local_businesses
columns.description: Annual funding received from local businesses, in US dollars.

columns.name: daily_pedestrian_traffic
columns.description: Average number of pedestrians passing near the garden daily.

columns.name: garden_type_regulation
columns.description: A binary indicator of whether local regulations favor food-producing over ornamental types.

columns.name: has_water_feature
columns.description: Indicates if the garden has any water features like fountains or ponds.

columns.name: volunteer_participation_rate
columns.description: Percentage of volunteers participating in garden activities compared to total volunteer pool.

columns.name: sunlight_hours_per_day
columns.description: Average number of sunlight hours the garden receives per day

columns.name: square_footage
columns.description: Total area of the garden dedicated to planting, measured in square feet.

columns.name: green_jobs_available
columns.description: Number of job openings in green industries within the city.

columns.name: average_plant_age_years
columns.description: Average age of the plants in the garden measured in years.

columns.name: number_of_staff
columns.description: Number of full-time staff members who work in the garden.

columns.name: public_funding
columns.description: The amount of funding received from governmental or public sources annually.

columns.name: sunlight_exposure_hours
columns.description: Average number of hours the garden receives direct sunlight per day.

columns.name: city_population
columns.description: Total population of the city.

columns.name: percentage_of_flower_beds
columns.description: Percentage of the garden area dedicated to flower beds.

columns.name: number_of_plant_types
columns.description: The count of different types of plants in the garden.

columns.name: average_growth_time
columns.description: Average number of months required for plants in the garden to reach maturity.

columns.name: late_night_business_count
columns.description: Number of businesses open until 9 PM or later in the area.

columns.name: offers_green_waste_recycling
columns.description: Indicates if the garden offers facilities for green waste recycling.

columns.name: local_funding_amount
columns.description: Financial contributions from local entities or individuals, expressed in thousands of dollars.

columns.name: sustainable_composting
columns.description: Whether sustainable composting methods are used in the garden. 'Yes' for gardens using sustainable composting, 'No' otherwise.

columns.name: public_transit_access
columns.description: Indicates if the garden has access to public transit within a 0.5-mile radius.

columns.name: private_funding
columns.description: The amount of funding received from private sources annually.

columns.name: is_residential_area
columns.description: Indicates if the garden is located in a residential area, potentially influencing the types of plants cultivated due to community involvement.

columns.name: average_income_level
columns.description: Average yearly income in the city, categorized as 'low', 'medium', or 'high'.

columns.name: rare_plant_species_ratio
columns.description: Proportion of rare plant species in the garden.

columns.name: average_annual_temperature
columns.description: The average annual temperature in degrees Celsius of the city where the garden is located.

columns.name: land_availability
columns.description: Indicates whether the area has ample available land for gardening.

columns.name: number_of_local_food_markets
columns.description: The number of local food markets within a 5 km radius of the garden

columns.name: public_transport_accessibility
columns.description: Accessibility of public transport on a scale from 1 to 10.

columns.name: vegetable_plots
columns.description: Whether the garden includes vegetable plots. 'Yes' for gardens with vegetable plots, 'No' for gardens without them.

columns.name: garden_accessibility_index
columns.description: A numeric score representing how accessible the garden is, considering factors like public transportation access and physical ease of entry.

columns.name: number_of_sustainability_workshops
columns.description: Total number of workshops held on sustainability practices in the garden.

columns.name: green_space_per_1000_residents
columns.description: Amount of green space in square meters available per 1000 residents.

columns.name: volunteer_involvement_level
columns.description: Level of volunteer involvement in community activities on a scale from 0 to 10.

columns.name: has_educational_programs
columns.description: Indicates whether the garden has any educational programs about gardening or sustainability.

columns.name: garden_space_per_capita
columns.description: The amount of garden space available per capita in square meters.

columns.name: average_rainfall_mm
columns.description: Average rainfall in millimeters the location of the garden receives annually.

columns.name: annual_visitor_count
columns.description: The total number of visitors to the garden annually.

columns.name: specializes_in_ornamentals
columns.description: Indicates if the garden primarily focuses on ornamental plants.

columns.name: number_of_fruit_trees
columns.description: Total number of fruit-bearing trees in the garden.

columns.name: has_local_partnerships
columns.description: Indicates whether the garden has partnerships with local businesses or organizations.

columns.name: residential_area_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of the city area that is residential.

columns.name: percentage_native_plants
columns.description: Percentage of the garden area covered with native plants.

columns.name: annual_rainfall
columns.description: Annual rainfall measured in millimeters.

columns.name: annual_cultural_events
columns.description: Number of cultural events held in the city each year.

columns.name: historical_visitation
columns.description: Average number of visitors per year over the past 5 years.

columns.name: focus_on_drought_resistant
columns.description: Indicates if the garden primarily focuses on drought-resistant plants.

columns.name: has_school_affiliation
columns.description: Indicates if the garden is officially affiliated with a local school or educational institution.

columns.name: number_of_workshops
columns.description: The count of workshops and training sessions conducted in the garden.

columns.name: residential_land_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of total land used for residential purposes in the city.

columns.name: population_density
columns.description: Number of people per square kilometer in the city.

columns.name: number_of_ornamental_plants
columns.description: Total number of ornamental plants in the garden.

columns.name: frequency_of_community_events
columns.description: Number of community events held in the garden per month

columns.name: tourist_attraction_rating
columns.description: Rating of city as a tourist destination on a scale from 1 to 10.

columns.name: number_of_local_volunteers
columns.description: The quantity of unpaid local individuals who help maintain the garden.

columns.name: total_city_area
columns.description: Total area of the city in square kilometers.

columns.name: frequent_gardening_workshops
columns.description: Indicates if the city holds gardening workshops more than twice a month

columns.name: high_density_residential_area
columns.description: Indicates if the garden is located in a high density residential area.

columns.name: public_green_space_area
columns.description: Total area of public green spaces in the city measured in square kilometers.

columns.name: guest_expert_visits
columns.description: The number of times experts visited the garden for educational events in a year.

columns.name: green_space_area
columns.description: Total area of parks and green spaces within the city in square kilometers.

columns.name: number_of_community_events
columns.description: Annual number of community events held in the garden.

columns.name: is_community_driven
columns.description: Indicates whether the garden is primarily managed and maintained by the community.

queries.question: Is there a relationship between the ratio of public green space area to city population and the number of annual cultural events held in a city?
queries.true_hypothesis: The number of annual cultural events in a city is directly proportional to the ratio of public green space area to city population, calculated as the quotient of public green space area by city population multiplied by 100.
